codeSystems.name: BasicAuditEntityTypesVS
codeSystems.title: Entity Types used by IHE BasicAudit
codeSystems.description: For use with AuditEvent.entity.type.  This includes codes defined in the BasicAudit.

codeSystems.name: DataSources
codeSystems.title: participant source types for RESTful create
codeSystems.description: create agent participant types for user operators that are in REST

codeSystems.name: DocumentReferenceStats
codeSystems.title: MHD DocumentReference status codes
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that does not include entered-in-error as that does not map

codeSystems.name: MHDlistTypesVS
codeSystems.title: MHD List Types ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet of the MHD List Types allowed

codeSystems.name: MHDprovideFolderActions
codeSystems.title: MHD Folder List Types ValueSet
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet of the allowed actions in a ITI-65 Provide Document Bundle for the Folder List type Resources. Where Folders are allowed to be Updated in addition to Created.

codeSystems.name: MHDprovidePatientActions
codeSystems.title: MHD Patient Types ValueSet
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet of the allowed actions in a ITI-65 Provide Document Bundle for the Patient type Resource. Where Patient would typically be indicated as a GET (read), but might be created or updated depending on policy.

codeSystems.name: RestObjectRoles
codeSystems.title: RESTful objects role in the event
codeSystems.description: The role that the given Object played in the Audit Event recorded
